module.name: pasar
module.description: %A module that gets the objects present in the OPC, and change their top down saliency according to their acceleration, appereance and disappereance.\n The Bottom Up saliency is based on lumicroma and will integrate the visual component.
module.copypolicy: Released under the terms of the GNU GPL v2.0
module.description-long: A module that gets the objects present in the OPC, and change their top down saliency according to their acceleration, appereance and disappereance.\n The Bottom Up saliency is based on lumicroma and will integrate the visual component.

param.desc: score of saliency for an appereance
score of saliency for an diappereance
score of saliency for an acceleration detected
under this threshlod, saliency is considered as 0
Speed of the decrease of the saliency over the time (should be less than 1)

input.description: Response port. Supported commands: - track string_name: track the object with the given opc name - track int_id: track the object with the given opc id - track double_x double_y double_z: track with the object coordinates - auto: switch attention between present objects - sleep: pause the head control until next command - pointing on/off: launch or stop pointing - waving on/off: launch or stop waving - help - quit
